## REST\_METHOD\_MIDDLEWARES variable

Injection token used for injecting array of rest middleware types that are default for each rest method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
REST_METHOD_MIDDLEWARES: InjectionToken<Type<RestMiddleware>[]>
```
